advgear.ponder.advanced_gearbox.header: Relaying rotational force using Advanced Gearboxes
advgear.ponder.advanced_gearbox.text_1: Getting all degrees of freedom is tricky and bulky.
advgear.ponder.advanced_gearbox.text_2: When placed with cogwheels in the offhand, they will automatically populate.
advgear.ponder.advanced_gearbox.text_3: You can use small cogwheels to add outputs to the gearbox.
advgear.ponder.advanced_gearbox.text_5: An advanced gearbox is a dynamic and compact version of using large cogwheels.
advgear.ponder.advanced_gearbox_remove.t: You may wish to remove a cogwheel from the gearbox.
You can use a wrench to remove cogwheels.
